full_summary:
**Announcement of Government Tender**

### Solicitation for Infrastructure Maintenance and Repair Services

**Reference Number:** WS3723823281-Doc3723823335

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Publication Date:** October 25, 2022

**Closing Date:** October 26, 2022 at 2:00 PM EST

**Solicitation Number:** WS3723823281

**Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)

**Description:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals from qualified contractors to provide infrastructure maintenance and repair services in the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Tender Requirements

* The selected contractor will be responsible for providing maintenance and repair services for various government infrastructure assets.
* The contract is expected to be awarded based on the lowest price submitted.

### Tender Process

* The tender process will be conducted on an open and competitive basis.
* Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Ariba Discovery platform.

### Important Details

* Tender documents, including the solicitation and attachments, can be accessed via the Ariba Discovery platform.
* Bidders are responsible for ensuring they have the necessary documentation and information to respond to the tender.
* The tender closing date and time are strictly adhered to; late submissions will not be accepted.

### Contact Information

* For inquiries and submissions, please contact Generic Procurement at [tps gc.pasaesta-apepsbts.pwgsc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tps gc.pasaesta-apepsbts.pwgsc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Mandatory Requirements

* The tender description and attachment are for testing purposes only and do not contain any actual information. Bidders are expected to ensure they have all necessary documentation to respond to the tender.

### Language
This announcement will be issued in both English and French. Leave a comment below if you want the French version.  I'll add it in two minutes.
